statements: DELETE FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND send_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 10 AND campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
DELETE FROM subscribers WHERE status = 'unsubscribed' OR last_opened_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM open_rates WHERE campaign_id = 12345 AND open_date = '2022-05-01' AND email_address = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' AND click_date = '2022-06-15' AND campaign_id = 54321;

DELETE FROM open_rates
WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND email_address = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
